results.name: a(1) = 1, for n > 1, if A079559(n) = 0, a(n) = 2*a(A256992(n)), otherwise a(n) = A250469(a(A256992(n))).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(1) = 1, for n > 1, if A079559(n) = 0 [when n is a term of A055938], a(n) = 2*a(A256992(n)), otherwise a(n) = A250469(a(A256992(n))).
As a composition of other permutations:
xref: Related or similar permutations: A250245, A252753, A252755, A279338, A279341, A279343.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 12 2016
